original: intros P Q H1 p H2 H3. intros a H4. induction P. - inversion H2. - simpl in *. destruct H2. + rewrite H. apply incl_hd. apply H3. apply H4. + apply incl_tl. * apply IHP. apply H. * apply H. * apply H3. * apply H4.
